stories.title: What Really Happened During the 2003 Blackout?

stories.text:
AFAIK, NEXTSPACE is the only NeXTSTEP-like desktop environment that is (was) actively being developed (https://github.com/trunkmaster/nextspace). The author had been working on this project for more than 5 years and he had been pushing code almost every single day.

Unfortunately, he had to stop development since Russia invasion of Ukraine, as he lives in Kyiv, Ukraine. He said he was OK and would like to continue development "after Ukraine’s victory" (https://github.com/trunkmaster/nextspace/discussions/412). But that was about 4 months ago.

As someone who really likes NeXTSTEP and hopes NEXTSPACE to succeed, the current situation is sad.

Just wanted to inform the crowds at HN about this.

:wq
stories.title: Tell HN: Nextspace (NeXTSTEP-like DE) stopped development as author in Ukraine

stories.text:
I've been seeing a lot of people asking for a "better AWS console". Curious if anyone has seen any good alternatives to the AWS console, or has a wishlist for what they'd want to see.

My wishlist:

- help me FIND resources across regions, so I don't have dangling / forgotten resources

- show me the cost of every resource when I create it, without having to open Cost Explorer and dig through my tags properly

- 1-click SSO setup, so I can add/remove people from GSuite without worrying about their IAM equivalent

- Show me all my resources (EC2 instances etc.) across all my regions, so I don't have to check every region when I'm looking for something or in a fire-fighting situation
stories.title: AWS Console Alternatives / Wishlist
